enhanced_by.reason: Both methods reset or clear the state of the FromBuilder, preparing it for new operations.
Both methods involve adding or updating steps in the FromBuilder, which can be used to set up the initial state for the scan method.
The build method constructs the final output, which can be used to assert the expected state after the scan method has been executed.
The yield_ method adds a yield step, which can be used to assert the expected steps after the scan method has been executed.
